util.layers
Class LayerPanel

java.lang.Object
  util.layers.LayerPanel

public abstract class LayerPanel
extends java.lang.Object

This class will represent the GUI Layer Panel. Layer panel contains a collection of layers. Methods of this class will perform operations on this collection to reflect which layers are currently in existance.

Field Summary
(package private)  java.util.Collection<Layer> layers

Method Summary
abstract  void deleteLayer(Layer layer)
          Delete the specified layer.
abstract  void moveLayer(Layer layer, int from, int to)
          Move the specified layer from the specified index to the other specified index in the layers collection.
abstract  void newLayer(Layer layer)
          Create a new layer that will be viewable in this panel.

Method Detail

newLayer

public abstract void newLayer(Layer layer)
Create a new layer that will be viewable in this panel. Place it at index 0 of the layers collection.

Parameters:
layer - The layer to be added

deleteLayer

public abstract void deleteLayer(Layer layer)
Delete the specified layer.

Parameters:
layer - The layer to be deleted

moveLayer

public abstract void moveLayer(Layer layer,
                               int from,
                               int to)
Move the specified layer from the specified index to the other specified index in the layers collection.

Parameters:
from - The index of the selected layer
to - The index the layer will be moved to
